author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: These star wars bag charms are quite impressive
review:
Opening;

The lukes landspeeder is my second star wars bag charms to the star destroyer and like the star destroyer this is quite an impressive little build .

The build-

The build is on a 2×3 modified light tan plate , with a 1×2 behind it and two modified plates at the back to attach a 1×1 light tan cone to the sides for the side thrusters ontop there is another 2×3 modified plate in light tan to get the sloped nose with a 2×2 light grey round tile underneath , a 1×2 dark grey cheese slope for the windshield , a 1×2 light tan grille is used for the seating area and the back has a snot on a jumper attaching another 1×1 light tan cone for a thruster . 

In conclusion -

this is a pretty nice bag charm but the choice of light tan is a bit strange as the lukes landspeeder released in 2017 was in light nugat which was the year before this released , but Lego doesn't really make these pieces in light nugat so it really is just a cost saving measure but overall I recommend this set to any Lego star wars fan as this is just a harmless bag charm .
